title: Do you like watching sports? What sports do you enjoy watching?

korean: 나는 스포츠 보는 걸 좋아하는 편이야.
축구는 월드컵이나 유럽 리그 경기를 주로 봐.
응원하는 팀이 있어서 경기 있을 때마다 챙겨봐.
특히 시즌 후반 플레이오프 때는 정말 재밌어.
농구나 배구도 가끔 보는데, 결승전 같은 중요한 경기 위주로.
올림픽 때는 여러 종목 다 보려고 노력해.
특히 한국 선수들 경기는 꼭 봐.
스포츠 보면서 스트레스도 풀리는 것 같아.
english: I'm the type who likes watching sports.
Especially, I often watch soccer and baseball.
For soccer, I mainly watch World Cup or European league games.
I have a team I support, so I watch whenever there's a game.
For baseball, I enjoy watching Korean professional baseball.
Especially during the playoffs at the end of the season, it's really fun.
I also sometimes watch basketball or volleyball, mainly important games like finals.
During the Olympics, I try to watch various events.
Especially, I definitely watch Korean athletes' games.
Watching while cheering is really thrilling.
It's more fun when watching with friends.
I think stress is relieved while watching sports.
